structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.catch_line: Applicability of KRS 411.500 to 411.570 -- Character of private nuisance.

text.section: Any and all proceedings in the nature of actions for private nuisance as heretofore arising at common law shall be governed by KRS 411.500 to 411.570.
A private nuisance shall be either a permanent nuisance or a temporary nuisance, but shall not be both.

law.history: Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 3, effective May 24, 1991.
